name: Superhuman
title: superhuman.com
shortDescription: Superhuman is an AI-native email tool designed to enhance productivity for high-performing teams. It features capabilities like automatically organizing inboxes, writing emails with AI, and scheduling with ease. Users can focus on important emails, thanks to features like Auto Labels and Auto Archive, making email management efficient and less time-consuming.
cons: May be overly complex for casual users
Potential privacy concerns with AI integration
Dependence on AI for basic functionalities

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Gmail
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers comprehensive email services with AI features.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Outlook
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Integrated with Microsoft's ecosystem for productivity.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ProtonMail
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on security and privacy for email communication.
